title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Don't leave your pet in a hot car. photo by Carol Kruse  Pets are NOT ALLOWED on any trails in the monument or in buildings.  Pets are allowed in the parking lot only and must be leashed at all times. Please clean up after your pet.  NOTE: Summer heat is intense; pets left in vehicles - even for a short time - can suffer heat stroke and die.
